definition: land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

sentences.english: Justin's kindergarten had a parent-teacher-student activity on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 星期六大貝貝的幼稚園有親子活動。

sentences.english: I am a student at Springfield Flowers Kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 我在春田花花幼稚園上學。

sentences.english: Reading was simply a requirement for progressing from kindergarten to first grade.
sentences.chinese: 學會閱讀是孩子從幼稚園過渡到一年級的必修課。

sentences.english: Tomi is hopelessly in love with Veronika, a lovely kindergarten teacher, but even with the help of S.
sentences.chinese: 他癡戀着維羅尼卡，一個可愛的幼稚園老師。

sentences.english: My little sister goes to kindergarten every morning.
sentences.chinese: 我的小妺妺每朝都回幼稚園去。

sentences.english: The course is designed for children, who have started to study in pre-nursery or kindergartens.
sentences.chinese: 課程適用於幼兒及幼稚園階段的學生而設。

sentences.english: We decided to send all three children to Chinese kindergarten and schools.
sentences.chinese: 我們決定把三個孩子都送到華文幼稚園和學校。

sentences.english: ENTHUSIASTIC】My little brother is very enthusiastic about going to kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 我小弟非常熱衷於上幼稚園。

sentences.english: A French section, which follows the official hours and programmes of the French Ministry of Education, from kindergarten to high school.
sentences.chinese: 由幼稚園至高中跟隨法國教育部制定的時間表和課程。

sentences.english: It typically occurs in small epidemics in nursery schools or kindergartens, usually during the summer and autumn months.
sentences.chinese: 常在夏季和秋季多發於託兒所，幼稚園等場所。

sentences.english: In America, even kindergartens and elementary schools have graduation ceremonies .
sentences.chinese: 在美國，甚至連幼稚園和國小都有畢業典禮。

sentences.english: Even kindergarteners want that blue ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 連上幼稚園的孩子都想要一個藍絲帶。

sentences.english: Take your puppy to puppy kindergarten classes.
sentences.chinese: 採取您的小狗，以小狗幼稚園班。

sentences.english: Is in good physical build-up and healthy enough for admission to a creche or kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 有良好的體格，適宜就讀幼兒院或幼稚園。

sentences.english: There is nothing more essential for a kindergartener than the qualities of being caring and patient.
sentences.chinese: 在幼稚園教員中最重要的就是慈愛和有耐心的特質。

sentences.english: English Teacher of Zhuhai Yung Wing International Kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 珠海容閎國際幼稚園外籍教師。

definition: head of a household/family head/patriarch/parent or guardian of a child
to open/to start (a business etc)/to set up
to enter a school or college/to go to school for the first time as a child
to take extra lessons in a cram school or with a private tutor
